If you're looking for a movie that will keep you on the edge of your seat, then "Taken" is a great choice. The suspenseful plot and thrilling action will keep you glued to the screen until the very end. 

If you're interested in something with a bit more heart and drama, then "Once Upon a Time in the West" is a perfect option. The film's stunning visuals and powerful performances will stay with you long after the credits roll. 

If you're looking for a comedy, then "What Women Want" is a great choice. The film's witty humor and charming characters will keep you entertained from beginning to end.
